description.zh-cn: 中华民国的犯罪侦查与情报机构，隶属于法务部。其前身为1928年成立的国民革命军总司令部密查组，历经多次改组与更名。
description.en: The crime investigation and intelligence agency of the Republic of China, subordinate to the Ministry of Justice. Its predecessor was the Secret Investigation Group of the National Revolutionary Army Headquarters established in 1928, and it has undergone multiple reorganizations and name changes.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国掌管全国检察、司法行政、狱政、司法保护、政风等相关事务的最高主管机关。
description.en: The highest authority in the Republic of China responsible for national prosecution, judicial administration, prison administration, judicial protection, and government ethics.

nodes.id: 国民革命军总司令部密查组

zh-cn: 国民革命军总司令部密查组

description.zh-cn: 法务部调查局的前身，为中华民国最初的情报调查组织，由戴笠成立，专司国民革命军北伐前线军事情报之调查搜集。
description.en: The predecessor of the Ministry of Justice Investigation Bureau, the first intelligence and investigation organization of the Republic of China, established by Dai Li to specialize in collecting military intelligence on the front lines of the Northern Expedition.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国民政府军事委员会调查统计局首长，成立了“国民革命军总司令部密查组”。
description.en: Head of the Investigation and Statistics Bureau of the National Military Council of the Republic of China, established the 'Secret Investigation Group of the National Revolutionary Army Headquarters'.

description.zh-cn: 国民革命军在北伐时期的最高指挥机构。
description.en: The supreme command structure of the National Revolutionary Army during the Northern Expedition.

nodes.id: 国民政府军事委员会调查统计局

zh-cn: 国民政府军事委员会调查统计局

description.zh-cn: 法务部调查局的前身之一，成立于1932年。
description.en: One of the predecessors of the Ministry of Justice Investigation Bureau, established in 1932.

nodes.id: 中国国民党中央执行委员会调查统计局

zh-cn: 中国国民党中央执行委员会调查统计局

description.zh-cn: 法务部调查局的前身之一，由原军统局第一处改组而成，为中国国民党中央执行委员会所属机构。
description.en: One of the predecessors of the Ministry of Justice Investigation Bureau, reorganized from the first department of the original Military Statistics Bureau, and was an agency of the Central Executive Committee of the Kuomintang.

nodes.id: 中国国民党中央执行委员会

zh-cn: 中国国民党中央执行委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党在1924年至1950年间的最高决策机关。
description.en: The highest decision-making body of the Kuomintang from 1924 to 1950.

nodes.id: 中国国民党党员通讯局

zh-cn: 中国国民党党员通讯局

description.zh-cn: 法务部调查局的前身之一，由中统局更名而来。
description.en: One of the predecessors of the Ministry of Justice Investigation Bureau, renamed from the Central Statistics Bureau (Zhongtong).

description.zh-cn: 法务部调查局的前身之一，由党通局改隶中华民国内政部后更名而来。
description.en: One of the predecessors of the Ministry of Justice Investigation Bureau, renamed from the Party Communication Bureau after being transferred to the Ministry of the Interior of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国统筹全国内务的最高主管机关。
description.en: The highest authority in the Republic of China responsible for coordinating national internal affairs.

description.zh-cn: 法务部调查局的前身，由内政部调查局改隶司法行政部后更名而来。
description.en: The predecessor of the Ministry of Justice Investigation Bureau, renamed from the Investigation Bureau of the Ministry of the Interior after being transferred to the Ministry of Justice Administration.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国法务部的前身。
description.en: The predecessor of the Ministry of Justice of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的情报机构，1955年改组为国防部情报局，部分业务拨归调查局。
description.en: An intelligence agency of the Republic of China, reorganized into the Intelligence Bureau of the Ministry of National Defense in 1955, with some functions transferred to the Investigation Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国防部军事情报局的前身之一，由国防部保密局改组而成。
description.en: One of the predecessors of the Military Intelligence Bureau of the Ministry of National Defense of the Republic of China, reorganized from the Confidentiality Bureau of the Ministry of National Defense.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国曾存在的军事单位，负责台湾地区戒严业务与维安工作。
description.en: A former military unit of the Republic of China responsible for martial law and security operations in the Taiwan area.

description.zh-cn: 法务部调查局于1997年成立的单位，执行金融情报中心及防制洗钱所涉相关业务。
description.en: A unit established by the Ministry of Justice Investigation Bureau in 1997 to perform duties as a financial intelligence unit and related anti-money laundering tasks.

description.zh-cn: 一个由世界各国的金融情报单位（FIUs）组成的国际组织。
description.en: An international organization composed of Financial Intelligence Units (FIUs) from around the world.

description.zh-cn: 规范法务部调查局组织、编制及掌理事项的法律。
description.en: The law that regulates the organization, staffing, and functions of the Ministry of Justice Investigation Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 法务部调查局的内部业务单位，根据《法务部调查局组织法》设立。
description.en: An internal operational unit of the Ministry of Justice Investigation Bureau, established in accordance with the 'Organization Act of the Ministry of Justice Investigation Bureau'.

description.zh-cn: 内政部调查局第一任局长。
description.en: The first Director of the Investigation Bureau of the Ministry of the Interior.

description.zh-cn: 内政部调查局第二任局长。
description.en: The second Director of the Investigation Bureau of the Ministry of the Interior.

description.zh-cn: 在台湾组建司法行政部调查局，并担任首任局长，被称为“调查局之父”。
description.en: Established the Investigation Bureau of the Ministry of Justice Administration in Taiwan and served as its first director, known as the 'Father of the Investigation Bureau'.

description.zh-cn: 曾任法务部调查局局长。
description.en: Former Director of the Ministry of Justice Investigation Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 曾任法务部调查局局长，是首位从基层做起、内部调升的局长。
description.en: Former Director of the Ministry of Justice Investigation Bureau, the first director to be promoted from within the ranks.

description.zh-cn: 曾任法务部调查局局长，是首位拥有博士学历的局长。
description.en: Former Director of the Ministry of Justice Investigation Bureau, the first director to hold a doctoral degree.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国印第安纳州的公立研究型大学。
description.en: A public research university in Indiana, United States.

description.zh-cn: 曾任法务部调查局局长及法务部部长，是首位本省籍及文人出身的调查局长。
description.en: Former Director of the Ministry of Justice Investigation Bureau and Minister of Justice, the first Taiwanese-born and civilian director of the Investigation Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 曾代理法务部调查局局长职务。
description.en: Formerly served as Acting Director of the Ministry of Justice Investigation Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 曾任法务部调查局局长。
description.en: Former Director of the Ministry of Justice Investigation Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 曾任法务部调查局局长。
description.en: Former Director of the Ministry of Justice Investigation Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 曾任法务部调查局局长，是首位卸任后被起诉的前局长。
description.en: Former Director of the Ministry of Justice Investigation Bureau, the first former director to be indicted after leaving office.

description.zh-cn: 曾任法务部调查局局长。
description.en: Former Director of the Ministry of Justice Investigation Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 曾任法务部调查局局长，从基层调查员做起。
description.en: Former Director of the Ministry of Justice Investigation Bureau, started as a field investigator.

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾台北市的综合性研究型公立大学。
description.en: A comprehensive public research university located in Taipei, Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 曾任法务部调查局局长。
description.en: Former Director of the Ministry of Justice Investigation Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾新北市的私立综合大学。
description.en: A private comprehensive university located in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾台中市的私立综合大学。
description.en: A private comprehensive university located in Taichung, Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 曾任法务部调查局局长，后任驻捷克代表。
description.en: Former Director of the Ministry of Justice Investigation Bureau, later served as the representative to the Czech Republic.

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾基隆市的国立大学，以海洋科学与工程为特色。
description.en: A national university in Keelung, Taiwan, specializing in marine science and engineering.

description.zh-cn: 位于英国剑桥的研究型书院联邦制大学。
description.en: A collegiate research university in Cambridge, United Kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 曾任法务部调查局局长，是首位检察官出身的局长，后升任法务部部长。
description.en: Former Director of the Ministry of Justice Investigation Bureau, the first director with a prosecutor background, later promoted to Minister of Justice.

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾台北市的私立综合大学。
description.en: A private comprehensive university located in Taipei, Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾台北市的私立综合大学。
description.en: A private comprehensive university located in Taipei, Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 曾代理法务部调查局局长职务。
description.en: Formerly served as Acting Director of the Ministry of Justice Investigation Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 曾任法务部调查局局长及行政执行署署长等职务。
description.en: Formerly served as Director of the Ministry of Justice Investigation Bureau and Director-General of the Administrative Enforcement Agency.

description.zh-cn: 曾任法务部调查局局长及多个地方检察署检察长。
description.en: Former Director of the Ministry of Justice Investigation Bureau and chief prosecutor of several district prosecutors offices.

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾台北市的国立大学，以社会科学、商学、法学、国际事务所闻名。
description.en: A national university in Taipei, Taiwan, renowned for social sciences, business, law, and international affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国司法院及考试院共同监督的司法官养成教育机构。
description.en: An educational institution for judicial officers in the Republic of China, jointly supervised by the Judicial Yuan and the Examination Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 现任法务部调查局局长。
description.en: The current Director of the Ministry of Justice Investigation Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾台中市的私立综合大学。
description.en: A private comprehensive university located in Taichung, Taiwan.

nodes.id: 法务部调查局资安鉴识实验室

zh-cn: 法务部调查局资安鉴识实验室

description.zh-cn: 法务部调查局资通安全处下设的单位，为台湾首座数位鉴识实验室。
description.en: A unit under the Cyber Security Investigation Office of the Ministry of Justice Investigation Bureau, it is Taiwan's first digital forensics laboratory.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国第10、11任总统。
description.en: The 10th and 11th President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 法务部调查局隶属于法务部。
description.en: The Ministry of Justice Investigation Bureau is subordinate to the Ministry of Justice.

description.zh-cn: 随母机构司法行政部更名为法务部，司法行政部调查局更名为法务部调查局。
description.en: Following the renaming of its parent organization from the Ministry of Justice Administration to the Ministry of Justice, the Investigation Bureau of the Ministry of Justice Administration was renamed the Ministry of Justice Investigation Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 内政部调查局改隶司法行政部，并更名为司法行政部调查局。
description.en: The Investigation Bureau of the Ministry of the Interior was transferred to the Ministry of Justice Administration and renamed the Investigation Bureau of the Ministry of Justice Administration.

relationships.source: 中国国民党党员通讯局

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党党员通讯局改隶中华民国内政部，并更名为内政部调查局。
description.en: The Party Members Communication Bureau of the Kuomintang was transferred to the Ministry of the Interior of the Republic of China and renamed the Investigation Bureau of the Ministry of the Interior.

relationships.source: 中国国民党中央执行委员会调查统计局
relationships.target: 中国国民党党员通讯局

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党中央执行委员会调查统计局（中统）被撤销后，更名为中国国民党党员通讯局。
description.en: After the Investigation and Statistics Bureau of the Central Executive Committee of the Kuomintang (Zhongtong) was abolished, it was renamed the Party Members Communication Bureau of the Kuomintang.

relationships.source: 中国国民党中央执行委员会
relationships.target: 中国国民党中央执行委员会调查统计局

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党中央执行委员会决议撤销中统局。
description.en: The Central Executive Committee of the Kuomintang resolved to abolish the Zhongtong Bureau.

relationships.source: 国民政府军事委员会调查统计局
relationships.target: 中国国民党中央执行委员会调查统计局

description.zh-cn: 对日抗战开始后，军统重组，其第一处改为中国国民党中央执行委员会调查统计局（中统）。
description.en: After the start of the war against Japan, the Military Statistics Bureau was reorganized, and its first department was changed to the Investigation and Statistics Bureau of the Central Executive Committee of the Kuomintang (Zhongtong).

relationships.target: 国民革命军总司令部密查组

description.zh-cn: 1928年1月，戴笠成立了国民革命军总司令部密查组。
description.en: In January 1928, Dai Li established the Secret Investigation Group of the National Revolutionary Army Headquarters.

relationships.source: 国民革命军总司令部密查组

description.zh-cn: 国民革命军总司令部密查组是国民革命军总司令部下设的机构。
description.en: The Secret Investigation Group was an agency under the National Revolutionary Army Headquarters.

description.zh-cn: 1955年，国防部保密局改组为国防部情报局。
description.en: In 1955, the Confidentiality Bureau of the Ministry of National Defense was reorganized into the Intelligence Bureau of the Ministry of National Defense.

description.zh-cn: 1955年，国防部保密局的保防侦查等业务拨归调查局。
description.en: In 1955, functions such as counter-intelligence and investigation from the Confidentiality Bureau of the Ministry of National Defense were transferred to the Investigation Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 1997年4月23日，调查局成立洗钱防制中心。
description.en: On April 23, 1997, the Investigation Bureau established the Money Laundering Prevention Center.

description.zh-cn: 1998年6月，调查局洗钱防制中心加入艾格蒙联盟。
description.en: In June 1998, the Investigation Bureau's Money Laundering Prevention Center joined the Egmont Group.

description.zh-cn: 2007年12月19日公布的《法务部调查局组织法》明定调查局设“洗钱防制处”。
description.en: The 'Organization Act of the Ministry of Justice Investigation Bureau' promulgated on December 19, 2007, stipulated the establishment of the 'Anti-Money Laundering Division' within the Investigation Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 沈之岳被称为“调查局之父”。
description.en: Shen Zhiyue is known as the 'Father of the Investigation Bureau'.

description.zh-cn: 卸任调查局长后，接任法务部部长。
description.en: After leaving the post of Director of the Investigation Bureau, he became the Minister of Justice.

degree.en: Graduate of the Department of Law
Graduate of the Department of German
Graduate of the Graduate Institute of Public Policy

degree.zh-cn: 海洋环境资讯学系毕业
degree.en: Graduate of the Department of Marine Environmental Informatics

description.zh-cn: 卸任调查局长后，升任法务部部长。
description.en: After leaving the post of Director of the Investigation Bureau, he was promoted to Minister of Justice.

degree.en: LL.B. from the School of Law
LL.M. from the Graduate Institute of Law
Graduate of the Graduate Institute of Law
Graduate of the Department of Law

relationships.source: 法务部调查局资安鉴识实验室

description.zh-cn: 资安鉴识实验室设于法务部调查局资通安全处下。
description.en: The Information Security Forensic Laboratory is established under the Cyber Security Investigation Office of the Ministry of Justice Investigation Bureau.

relationships.target: 法务部调查局资安鉴识实验室

description.zh-cn: 2006年12月26日，时任总统陈水扁为法务部调查局资安鉴识实验室揭牌启用。
description.en: On December 26, 2006, then-President Chen Shui-bian inaugurated the Information Security Forensic Laboratory of the Ministry of Justice Investigation Bureau.
